description:
Focusing the mind on the mantra, SHREEM NAMAH, during a yoga practice and meditation, the practitioner will gain the power to rewire their brain for abundant thinking. The course contains:

  • Introduction to the course explaining how to overcome blocks surrounding abundance.
  • 20 minute yoga practice centered on the mantra, Shreem Namah, which allows the practitioner to connect to the breath and body, and feel the abundance in every moment.
  • 10 minute meditation focusing on the mantra, Shreem Namah, to train the brain to focus on abundance in every situation.
  • Bonus Lecture clarifying myths and misinformation about meditation.
  • Bonus Lecture revealing the power of Sanskrit mantras.
title: Yoga for Manifesting Abundance
